text: @piersmorgan UK #covid19 #lockdown started in confusion without real leadership form #borrisjohnson with FA\Premier League & Rugby Union canceling games 10 days before UK Gov officially launched it's lockdown. Lockdown is ending same way with companies like B&Q & others going their own way.
